com.autogarcon.android

Class PaymentsUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.autogarcon.android.PaymentsUtil

  • public class PaymentsUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains helper static methods for dealing with the Payments API.

    Many of the parameters used in the code are optional and are set here merely to call out their existence. Please consult the documentation to learn more and feel free to remove ones not relevant to your implementation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      Creates an instance of PaymentsClient for use in an Activity using the default test environment

      Create a Google Pay API base request object with properties used in all requests.

      Describe the expected returned payment data for the CARD payment method
